Posts.Content: I again I thank You for my smile and laughter of the day xxxoooo
Posts.Title: 2009's First Christmas Joke--you may have already seen this.

Posts.Content: my thoughts and prayers are with you and this board is not just to talk about our BC its about woman going through similar situation to talk to each other ...we are here for you ... to listen to talk and to even send you a cyber hug....((((((((((hugs)))))))))) and no I am thinking about you tonight xxxxxooo <3 Lisa
Posts.Title: Tomorrow (tonight) is a bit tough....

Posts.Content: hi your chemo sounds alot like mine,except will be 3 treatments every weeks of docetaxol and bevacizumab , followed by fec for 3 cycles , 1 month break then 25 radiation treatments (5x week for 5 weeks) I have already had lumpectomy..... so they are looking at me finishing up everything sometime in may or june 2010.. but the bevacizumab (herceptin) will be given every 3 weeks for 1 year so this will bring me to Nov 2010...so this is I guess 1 year from now ... I worked full time before all this and I am more tired right now from appts, surgery etc but then I think" It will be next year before I know it , we can keep each other going!! the woman on here are sooo amzing this is what got me thru alot so far... good luck to you I start chemo nov 25th when do you start??? (hugs) ...lisa
Posts.Title: Triple negative and radiation treatment

Posts.Content: mine will be out tomorrow ! Lisa
Posts.Title: Ornament mailed (sorry it took so long!)

Posts.Content: hi I go tomorrow for mine but I am so glad to hear that yours went wellI will keep you posted xxxooooo
Posts.Title: Hey newbiefromcananda

Posts.Content: hello I brought a crossword puzzle, magazines, almonds, water a notebook and paper, my thank you cards (you can fill out your christmas cards at this time as well) they have tv's so I watched a bit of tv and of course my sister, I was there 5 hours and it didn't seem that long best of luck to you xoxoxoxo Lisa
Posts.Title: Chemo Chicks: What did you do during your chemo treatments?

Posts.Content: so sorry Donna... I have had 2 chemo and day 4 the big D but with 2 doses of Immodium it goes away.. I drink gatorade during it... but I fell fluish day 4-day 8 I am sure they will figure something out for you.. you shouldn't haveto suffer thru this... take care and best of luck...xoxoxox Lisa
Posts.Title: UPDATE after Third Chemo

Posts.Content: aww linda ... you poor thing.. I guess you right I don't know what to say as I am going thru similiar things....you are right about our children they give us the will do be strong (but drive us crazy at the same time) lol....do what is best for you.. what you feel is right... best of luck to you happy holidays and know "it will all work out" right? :) <3
